text: Viktor Aleksandrovich Butenko (; born 10 March 1993) is a Russian track and field athlete competing in the discus throw. He holds a personal best of , set in 2013.Maryanchik, Natalia (2013-05-27). Kupina, Koneva and Klishina star at the Russian Team Champs. IAAF. Retrieved on 2016-07-31. He represented the host nation at the 2013 World Championships in Athletics in Moscow, finishing eighth.Viktor Butenko. IAAF. Retrieved on 2016-07-31. He was born in Stavropol.Viktor Butenko. European Athletics. Retrieved on 2016-07-31. He was a finalist at the 2014 European Athletics Championships, placing fifth. Among his other honours are a win at the European Cup Winter Throwing at a bronze at the European Team Championships in 2014.Viktor Butenko. All Athletics. Retrieved on 2016-07-31. He was the winner at the Russian Athletics Championships in 2016.Butenko Viktor. RusAthletics. Retrieved on 2016-07-31. However, he was suspended from international competition in 2016 due to an overarching ban on the All-Russia Athletic Federation as a response to doping.RUSSIAN ATHLETES INELIGIBLE FOR PARTICIPATION IN INTERNATIONAL COMPETITIONS DURING THE SUSPENSION OF THE ALL RUSSIAN ATHLETICS FEDERATION (ARAF). IAAF (2016).
